title: Kidnapped in Paradise
description: It was supposed to be a relaxing vacation, and it was… until I end up kidnapped. Luckily a gorgeous, dark haired, green eyed man saves me, but he’s not the knight in shining armor I thought he was. It turns out he wants me for himself, and he’s willing to do anything to make sure I remain his. *** This is a short and spicy novella including dark themes. ***
author: Darcy Rose
